#summary Use Case: ViewGrades
==UseCases==


= ViewGrades=


|| Use Case || ViewGrades ||
||Identified || S4 ||
|| Description: || The ViewGrades use case models a Student checking his or her grades.|| 
||Actors|| Student||
|| Preconditions: || 1. User must be successfully logged in as a Student via the LogIn use case. ||
||Flow of Events: ||1. The use case starts when a Student decides to view his or her grades.||
||                ||2. The Student clicks the View Grades button. ||
||                ||3. The Student is prompted to select a class from a list of options. ||
||                ||4. The Student will see a table with grades organized by assignment.||
||Post Condition:|| 1. The Student will be at the grades page for selected class.||
||                         || 2. The Student can view all available grades for selected class.||
